resources.string: Sword Art Online Movie: Ordinal Scale (2017)
We wrote this one-page film synopsis example to give you an idea of their style and content.

Lets talk about TMDB The Movie Database (TMDB) is a community built movie and TV database. Every piece of data has been added by our amazing community dating back to 2008. TMDBs strong international focus and breadth of data is largely unmatched and something were incredibly proud of. Put simply, we live and breathe community and thats precisely what makes us different.
